languages.text: {n}В скорченной фигуре, закутанной в алое, непросто узнать Паскаля Ханейманна. Прежде его фигура, даже сгорбленная весом силовой установки, излучала власть и мощь запретных знаний. Сейчас он кажется просто переломленным. Красное одеяние покрыто бурыми пятнами крови и черными — от священной смазки. Мехадендриты вяло шевелятся, словно умирающие змеи.{/n}

{n}The crooked figure wrapped in crimson looks nothing like the Pasqal Haneumann you know. Before, his silhouette, hunched though it may have been under the weight of his potentia coil, used to radiate authority and the power of restricted knowledge. Now he simply looks broken. His raiment is soiled with dark red bloodstains and black blotches of sacred unguents. His mechadendrites wriggle sluggishly like dying snakes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В скорченной фигуре, закутанной в алое, непросто узнать Паскаля Ханейманна. languages.text: {n}深紅に包まれひねくれたその姿は、あなたの知っているパスカル・ヘニュマンとは似ても似つかない。ポテンシアのコイルの重みに耐えかねて猫背になっていたとはいえ、以前の姿からは、権威と制限された知識の力を放っていた。今は単に壊れているように見える。彼の衣服は暗赤色の血痕で汚れており、聖なる軟膏の黒いしみで汚れている。彼の機械触手は瀕死の蛇のようにノロノロとうごめいていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crooked figure wrapped in crimson looks nothing like the Pasqal Haneumann you know. Before, his silhouette, hunched though it may have been under the weight of his potentia coil, used to radiate authority and the power of restricted knowledge. Now he simply looks broken. His raiment is soiled with dark red bloodstains and black blotches of sacred unguents. His mechadendrites wriggle sluggishly like dying snakes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}深紅に包まれひねくれたその姿は、あなたの知っているパスカル・ヘニュマンとは似ても似つかない。ポテンシアのコイルの重みに耐えかねて猫背になっていたとはいえ、以前の姿からは、権威と制限された知識の力を放っていた。今は単に壊れているように見える。彼の衣服は暗赤色の血痕で汚れており、聖なる軟膏の黒いしみで汚れている。彼の機械触手は瀕死の蛇のようにノロノロとうごめいていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个包裹在深红色斗篷中的扭曲身影，看起来完全不像你所熟知的帕斯卡·哈努曼。在这之前，尽管他总是被各种各样的线圈与零件压着，看起来弯腰驼背，但却散发着权威与知识的气场。可现在，他看起来就像是坏了一样。他的衣服上沾满了深红色的血迹与神圣机油留下的黑色斑点，机械触须缓慢地蠕动着，仿佛垂死的蛇一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crooked figure wrapped in crimson looks nothing like the Pasqal Haneumann you know. Before, his silhouette, hunched though it may have been under the weight of his potentia coil, used to radiate authority and the power of restricted knowledge. Now he simply looks broken. His raiment is soiled with dark red bloodstains and black blotches of sacred unguents. His mechadendrites wriggle sluggishly like dying snakes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个包裹在深红色斗篷中的扭曲身影，看起来完全不像你所熟知的帕斯卡·哈努曼。在这之前，尽管他总是被各种各样的线圈与零件压着，看起来弯腰驼背，但却散发着权威与知识的气场。可现在，他看起来就像是坏了一样。他的衣服上沾满了深红色的血迹与神圣机油留下的黑色斑点，机械触须缓慢地蠕动着，仿佛垂死的蛇一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La figura torcida envuelta en carmesí no se parece en nada al Pasqal Haneumann que conoces. Antes, su silueta, encorvada por el peso de su bobina de potentia, irradiaba autoridad y el poder de un conocimiento restringido. Ahora parece roto. Sus ropajes están manchados de sangre roja oscura y manchas negras de ungüentos sagrados. Sus mecadendritas se retuercen como serpientes moribundas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crooked figure wrapped in crimson looks nothing like the Pasqal Haneumann you know. Before, his silhouette, hunched though it may have been under the weight of his potentia coil, used to radiate authority and the power of restricted knowledge. Now he simply looks broken. His raiment is soiled with dark red bloodstains and black blotches of sacred unguents. His mechadendrites wriggle sluggishly like dying snakes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La figura torcida envuelta en carmesí no se parece en nada al Pasqal Haneumann que conoces. Antes, su silueta, encorvada por el peso de su bobina de potentia, irradiaba autoridad y el poder de un conocimiento restringido. Ahora parece roto. Sus ropajes están manchados de sangre roja oscura y manchas negras de ungüentos sagrados. Sus mecadendritas se retuercen como serpientes moribundas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die krumme, in Rot gehüllte Gestalt hat nichts mit dem Pasqal Haneumann gemein, den du kennst. Früher war seine Silhouette zwar ein wenig gedrungen ob des Gewichts seiner Potentia-Spule, doch er strahlte Autorität und die Macht geheimen Wissens aus. Nun sieht er schlicht gebrochen aus. Sein Gewand ist voller tiefroter Blutspuren und schwarzer Kleckse heiliger Salböle. Seine Mechadendriten winden sich träge wie sterbende Schlangen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crooked figure wrapped in crimson looks nothing like the Pasqal Haneumann you know. Before, his silhouette, hunched though it may have been under the weight of his potentia coil, used to radiate authority and the power of restricted knowledge. Now he simply looks broken. His raiment is soiled with dark red bloodstains and black blotches of sacred unguents. His mechadendrites wriggle sluggishly like dying snakes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die krumme, in Rot gehüllte Gestalt hat nichts mit dem Pasqal Haneumann gemein, den du kennst. Früher war seine Silhouette zwar ein wenig gedrungen ob des Gewichts seiner Potentia-Spule, doch er strahlte Autorität und die Macht geheimen Wissens aus. Nun sieht er schlicht gebrochen aus. Sein Gewand ist voller tiefroter Blutflecken und schwarzer Kleckse heiliger Salböle. Seine Mechadendriten winden sich träge wie sterbende Schlangen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La silhouette recroquevillée drapée d'écarlate ne ressemble en rien au Pasqal Haneumann que vous connaissez. Avant, bien que voûté sous le poids de son transformateur de puissance, il irradiait l'autorité et la puissance de la connaissance restreinte. Mais maintenant, il n'a plus l'air que d'un homme brisé. Ses vêtements sont couverts de sang séché et de taches d'onguents sacrés. Ses mécadendrites, quant à elles, se tortillent mollement comme des serpents à l'agonie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crooked figure wrapped in crimson looks nothing like the Pasqal Haneumann you know. Before, his silhouette, hunched though it may have been under the weight of his potentia coil, used to radiate authority and the power of restricted knowledge. Now he simply looks broken. His raiment is soiled with dark red bloodstains and black blotches of sacred unguents. His mechadendrites wriggle sluggishly like dying snakes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La silhouette recroquevillée drapée d'écarlate ne ressemble en rien au Pasqal Haneumann que vous connaissez. Avant, bien que voûté sous le poids de son transformateur de puissance, il irradiait l'autorité et la puissance de la connaissance restreinte. Mais maintenant, il n'a plus l'air que d'un homme brisé. Ses vêtements sont couverts de sang séché et de taches d'onguents sacrés. Ses mécadendrites, quant à elles, se tortillent mollement comme des serpents à l'agonie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kızıla bürünmüş çarpık silüet, tanıdığın Pasqal Haneumann'ı hiç andırmıyor. Eskiden salahiyet bobininin ağırlığı yüzünden kambur olmuş olsa da silüetine bakılınca otoritesi ve yasaklı bilgilerin gücü hissediliyordu. Şimdiyse sadece çökmüş gibi görünüyor. Giysisine koyu kırmızı kan ve siyah kutsal özyağ lekeleri bulaşmış. Mekadentritleri, can çekişen yılanlar gibi miskin miskin kıvranıyor.{/n}

His raiment is soiled with dark red bloodstains and black blotches of sacred unguents. His mechadendrites wriggle sluggishly like dying snakes.{/n}
